messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Jayn a cool moment
messages.msgSnippet: This is great :-) You may want to check out CDB! by William Steig; http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0689831609/102-9165102-3552948?v=glance&n=283155 A friend
messages.messageBody:
This is great :-)

You may want to check out "CDB!" by William Steig;
http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/0689831609/102-9165102-3552948?v=glance&n=283155

A friend of mine got this book when we were in our early teens. A group of
us read it together, and I can't remember too many times when I have
laughed harder. It was really a lot of fun. Thanks for bringing back some
great memories. I think I'll see if I can get a copy for Aquilina for
Christmas :-)

Kornelia

At 07:11 AM 12/12/05 -0800, "Robyn Coburn" <dezigna@...> wrote:

>I have to share this:
>
>Jayn just brought me a note inscribed:
>
>URYIM6 - and a heart symbol meaning hugs
>
>(You are why I am six.)
>
>Robyn L. Coburn
>
>
>--

"Do, or Do not; There is no 'try''." - Yoda
